summary: Frontend testing completed for Leaderlix Automation Platform. All requested features verified: Contacts page grouping (Buyer Persona, Área, Sector), Companies page 'Solo industrias activas' filter, and Campaigns page event-to-contacts filtering. Fixed one critical bug in Companies.jsx (withoutIndustry undefined).

ui_bugs.issue: Console warning: button cannot be descendant of button (nested buttons in accordion)

passed_tests: Contacts page: Grouping by 'Buyer Persona' shows 29 groups with fictitious names (Mariana Otros 298, Roberto Otros 181, Mateo 133, etc.)
Contacts page: Grouping by 'Área' shows 9 functional area groups (RRHH 343, Otras Direcciones 202, Médicas 105, Comerciales 94, Marketing 47, Event Planner 19, Compras 18)
Contacts page: Grouping by 'Sector' shows 10 sector groups (Otros Sectores 706, General 133, Pharmaceuticals 92, Banking 10, Automotive 7, Retail 5)
Companies page: 'Solo industrias activas' checkbox filter works correctly - reduces from 110 to 6 industries when enabled
Campaigns page: Selecting event 'Masterclass de IA para Negocios' (100% complete) shows 302 contacts from Buyer Personas: Mateo, rrhh_otros_sectores
Campaigns page: Events with <100% completion are locked and cannot be selected
Campaigns page: Contact filtering by event's buyer persona works correctly
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: Nested button warning in Contacts page accordion - consider restructuring the accordion trigger to avoid button nesting
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working: 1) Contacts page has 3 grouping modes (Buyer Persona, Área, Sector) all working correctly with expected data, 2) Companies page 'Solo industrias activas' filter reduces industries from 110 to 6, 3) Campaigns page correctly filters contacts by event's buyer persona. Fixed bug: withoutIndustry was undefined in Companies.jsx.

contacts_grouping_buyer_persona.details: 29 groups with fictitious names: Mariana Otros (298), Roberto Otros (181), Mateo (133), Carlos Otros (80), Diana Otros (77), etc.

contacts_grouping_area.details: 9 functional area groups: Direcciones de RRHH (343), Otras Direcciones (202), Sin Clasificar/Mateo (133), Direcciones Médicas (105), Direcciones Comerciales (94), Direcciones de Marketing (47), Event/Meeting Planner (19), Direcciones de Compras (18), Sin Área (4)

contacts_grouping_sector.details: 10 sector groups: Otros Sectores (706), General (133), Pharmaceuticals (92), Banking (10), Automotive (7), Retail (5), Telecommunications (4), Food & Beverages (3), Medical Devices (1), Sin Sector (4)

companies_active_filter.details: Checkbox 'Solo industrias activas (0)' filters industries from 110 to 6 when enabled

campaigns_event_contacts.details: Selecting event shows 302 contacts filtered by buyer persona (Mateo, rrhh_otros_sectores)

bugs_fixed.fix: Added 'const withoutIndustry = totalCompanies - withIndustry;' to Stats section
